phrases: Far beyond the deep blue Earth, you and I shall meet...
A snow-white feather will come fluttering down, swaying gently in the air.
Without holding back, I want to envelope you, my one and only love.
I know I have the power to protect the one I love, right here in my hands.
Just as I have always dreamed.
Let the wind carry off your hopes, faraway.
I have wings nobody can see.
They will take us to where we can be free.
Not only are there three of them now...
This time around I will show you the true power of a First Class Demon!
I can feel it...the throbbing energy of your collective joy.
But all that will end today.
Soon, all you will know will be the agony of a living hell...
Misfortune Arrives, and the Tea-Stalk Stands Upright?
I cannot even get them to notice when I appear!
Here I am, a demon, and I am up to my ears in misfortune!
To think that so much joy is concentrated around this man!
Now that that is settled... it is somewhere around here...
Looks like the time has come for me to put this to use!
With this Ultimate Last-resort Weapon in my hands...
Attacking them head-on will only invite more outside interference.
Now, then, what should I do?
Thank you for another great breakfast!
Sorry I keep imposing on you.
The one thing every girl should have...
You would better get a move on or you are going to be late for school.
Oh, I do not have class until the afternoon today.
That girl...she is Keiichi's sister, huh?
I think I can put her to use!
There is just one thing I am after here...your body!
I am claiming your body for my own.
Oh, I guess I was just hearing things.
Now, Megumi, you know that is bad manners.
There is is not a thing in this room worth anything.
Who the hell are you, anyway?
This is who the hell I am!
But that mark...it is the mark of a first-class demon...
Why do not you just lie there for the rest of your life?
From here on in, I am Megumi Morisato!
A test drive, did you say?
Yeah, that is what the Seniors want me to do.
Since our next race is coming up soon.
It is just that they are really into it.
There is going to be a lot of prize money.
What is with that look on your face?
You always call me'Kei-chan', for god's sake.
Do not call me like that.
I was just kidding around, all right?
Megumi, I thought you said you did not have class until later?
Megumi is always so full of life, is not she?
Good thing I put up a double shield.
That Belldandy does not have a clue it is me!
That means I can accomplish my goal!
I am going to give you two a taste of hell!
Using my Ultimate Last-resort Weapon... feared even by demons!
It is now time to break the seal of Evil...
I am most honored to be summoned by you.
Senbei, the God of Poverty, has received your call and is at your service.
I am the No. 1 elite God of Poverty.
You must not be fooled by my diminutive body!
Well, then, if that is the case, why do not you show me your powers?
My greatest joy lies in making others unhappy.
Take a good look now...if it pleases you!
As if I were dumb enough to fall for a 43-year-old trick like this!
You pack a pretty good punch, do not you?
No, it is just an ancient joke...
You pack a pretty good punch, do not you?
No, it is just an ancient joke...
I hope you are pleased with the results?
Needless to say, I am totally happy!
By making my opponent miserable, my wealth meter goes up, up, and away!
That is the Law of the Conservation of Happiness.
If you wish, I can generate more unhappiness!
With this demon on my side, I can win at last!
I have got to tell the Goddess Belldandy what happened as soon as possible.
I have got to show this to my mom!
We are going in the opposite direction!
I have got to show this to my mom!
It is persimmon leaf tea, from the trees in our yard.
I am glad to hear that.
Hey, look, there is a tea stalk floating upright!
It is good luck when you see a tea stalk standing up like this.
So why do they say that it is good luck?
Anyway, why do not we head over to the club house now?
Why are you acting like a kid?
While I block Belldandy from seeing or sensing anything...possess Keiichi!
Belldandy is not suspicious in the least.
Megumi, you are not acting like yourself today.
Yes, you are just like you always are.
Damn you, Keiichi, you are sharper than I thought.
But what does it matter as long as Belldandy does not get wise to me?
Oh, so you are here, too?
Really, I do not know why I even bother.
No one is more suited for unhappiness than this young fellow.
What do you think you are doing?
You get off me right now!
I am really going to get pissed off!
Kei-chan, you are such a pervert!
Oh, but you always were the type to do it anytime, anywhere, and...
What are you talking about, Megumi?
If Keiichi's miserable, Belldandy will have no choice but to return to Heaven!
You threw yourself onto Sayoko to protect her from danger!
I am not quite sure what happened just now, but thank you, Keiichi.
Um, were you mad at me, by any chance?
But I wonder what that was all about just now.
It was supposed to be sunny out all day today.
Senbei, make sure you get the job done next time.
Just leave it to me, I will handle it at full throttle!
All right, let me do my part, then...
Kei-chan, you are such a pervert!
I cannot believe you would molest your own sister right here!
Just because you cannot get anyone to date you...
Come to think of it, you have always looked at me inappropriately!
And with that, Keiichi will be labeled'subhuman', and...
That will force Belldandy to leave if nothing else will!
This time for sure, victory is mine!
Keiichi, you were trying to remove that insect from inside...
Tell me...you are not mad at me, are you?
Well, as long as you are not, that is fine.
Why did it end up like this?
I would like to ask you that myself.
I am on my way, Goddess Belldandy...
All these weird things have been happening all day.
If things go on like this, my pride will suffer huge damage.
This time for sure...shower those two with misfortune and despair!
So now we are seeing Kei-chan's true colors, huh?
Flirting with any girl he can get his hands on.
He is in a lose-lose situation now.
He cannot escape the onslaught of misery!
This time for sure... victory is really mine!
Oh, I get it, it is this!
I knew it, the pilot light went out!
We have got to open the windows right away!
I just spaced out all of a sudden...
If you had not come when you did, I really would have been in trouble.
I am just glad you are all right.
It is all thanks to Keiichi's quick thinking.
It is actually pretty scary when you get mad.
I know my happiness index should be going up!
That is why Keiichi was able to escape misfortune.
And the source of that happiness is...
We have got to seal her, no matter what!
I was wondering what kind of test you had in mind, but...
Where is the fun in being conventional in a quarter-mile race?
'Catch your opponents off balance!' is the motto of the Auto Club.
We will walk away with both the laughs and the prize money!
I am going to hold back Belldandy's powers.
Calm yourself, Spirit of Fire! Retreat, Spirit of Air!
In the name of Goddess First Class Belldandy...
Please, Spirits... please put out that fire!
Marller has taken over Megumi's body.
And she transformed me in this manner.
And she transformed me in this manner.
The Earth Spirit who lives in Megumi's apartment!
Your powers have been sealed by that demon!
Are you going to believe what that stuffed animal says?
Who cares if she finds out, she cannot attack me anyway!
That is right, there is no time to lose!
If you are not Marller, then you should be able to drink this!
It is tea with a tea stalk floating upright, it is good luck, like Keiichi said!
You are sending chills down my spine...
So that is the full power of a First Class Goddess...
You cast a spell at full power to save me, did not you?
I was so afraid you would be killed...
If only I would realized it was Marller...
Keiichi, you knew that Megumi was acting strangely today.
I am a failure as a goddess!
I am supposed to bring you happiness...
As long as I have a goddess like you by my side...
What in the world am I doing here?
Okay, why do not you come home with me?
You call yourself a God of Poverty, you worthless loser!
Do not pin the blame on me.
Why do not I show you right now?
Always believe in yourself and your Dreams.
Always believe in yourself and your Dreams.
I love you so much it hurts...
And it hurts me that I cannot tell you how I feel.
You and I have matching hearts...
So we must share the same scars deep down inside.
But now that I am in your arms, I think I can catch...
All we have to do is gaze at each other.
It is all right for your heart to flutter...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
Do not run away from happiness.
I will always be waiting for you.
So come rest your wings anytime.
It is all right to cry... anytime you need to.
I just want to see you again...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
I just want you to be happy.
Scars of the heart...a curse from the past that cannot be easily broken.
Yet people learn to overcome all that, and move on towards the future.
Next episode: Ah! What Do Talent and Hard Work Have to Do With It?
I know it is boot camp, but does she have to move in, too?
